summary: Plagued by guilt, a corrupt police official attempts to solve the case of a missing schoolgirl after seeing connections between her disappearance and a rash of prior abductions.
cast: David Morrissey|Lisa Howard|Chris Walker|Shaun Dooley|Jim Carter|Warren Clarke|Sean Bean|Sean Harris|Steven Robertson|Tony Mooney|Tony Pitts|Michelle Dockery|Andrew Cryer|Mark Addy|Beatrice Kelley|Katie Simpson|Paul Kynman|Daniel Mays|Robert Sheehan|James Ainsworth|Saskia Reeves|Andrew Garfield|John Henshaw|Gerard Kearns|Jemima Foxtrot|Gary Whitaker|Cara Seymour|Peter Mullan|Chris Brailsford|Catherine Tyldesley|Laura Carter|Hilton McRae|Ian Mercer|Emil Marwa|Molly Howe|Brendan McCoy|Tamsin Mitchell|Emily Millicent Mott
title: Red Riding 1983
